forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with peeks of sunshine expected late. High 14C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies this morning will become partly cloudy this afternoon. High 57F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally clear. Low 9C. Winds ENE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear skies. Low 46F. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny, along with a few afternoon clouds. High around 15C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 58F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low 8C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low 46F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High 11C. Winds ESE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. Low 42F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 8C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High around 45F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low 39F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
